item.title: Vólan – The Beginning (Начало)
item.description: theater closed, actors dismissed, I cannot retrieve what is lost. the final act and the curtain falls, farewell, world of illusions, I begin anew. ( Lyrics ) More Vólan (Moscow) on Bandcamp and VK .
